name: VELVEETA® Potato Bites
author: VELVEETA Cheese
summary: Crunchy, popable potato balls with an ooey gooey, cheesy center. Seriously. As if game day isn't enough fun already.
ingredients: 2 pounds baking potatoes, peeled, cut into chunks
¼ pound VELVEETA®, cut into 24 cubes
1 (2.75 ounce) packet SHAKE 'N BAKE Extra Crispy Seasoned Coating Mix
1 ½ cups TACO BELL® Thick 'N Chunky Salsa
directions: Cook potatoes in boiling water in large saucepan 15 to 20 min
Add onions, egg and pepper; mix just until blended
Empty coating mix into pie plate
Roll potato mixture into 24 balls, using about 2 Tbsp
Insert 1 VELVEETA cube into center of each ball, completely enclosing VELVEETA
Add, 1 at a time, to coating mix; turn to evenly coat
Place on rimmed baking sheet sprayed with cooking spray
